title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses Baker Mayfield's lengthy interview describing his break up with the Browns and why it's obvious he still hasn't learned anything since losing his status as a franchise QB. He defends the Dodgers for pulling Clayton Kershaw while he had a perfect game going. He praises Raiders QB Derek Carr for taking less on his latest contract extension and prioritizing a winning team over money. Plus, NBA champion Stephen Jackson joins the show to preview the NBA playoffs and which surprising team to watch out for. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
